question: 查询所有用户的姓名和邮箱
查询年龄大于25岁的用户数量
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM users WHERE age > 25;

question: 查询每个部门的平均工资
sql: SELECT department, AVG(salary) as avg_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department;

question: 查询最近一周的订单总金额
sql: SELECT SUM(amount) as total FROM orders WHERE order_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);

question: 查询库存数量小于10的产品名称
sql: SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE stock < 10;
result:
product_name
Laptop Model A
Mouse Wireless
Keyboard Pro

question: 查询销售额排名前5的销售员
sql: SELECT salesperson_name, total_sales FROM sales_summary ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
result:
salesperson_name,total_sales
John Smith,85000
Mary Johnson,78000
David Brown,72000
Sarah Wilson,69000
Mike Davis,65000

question: 查询每月新注册用户数
sql: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') as month, COUNT(*) as new_users FROM users GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;

question: 查询重复的邮箱地址
sql: SELECT email, COUNT(*) as count FROM users GROUP BY email HAVING count > 1;

question: 查询未完成的订单及其客户信息
sql: SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, o.order_date FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.status = 'pending';

question: 查询每个类别中价格最高的产品
sql: SELECT category, product_name, price FROM products p1 WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM products p2 WHERE p2.category = p1.category);
result:
category,product_name,price
Electronics,Premium Laptop,2500.00
Clothing,Designer Jacket,299.99
Books,Technical Manual,89.95
